title: Dueling Presidents
description:
On the eve of the midterm elections, Presidents Donald Trump and Barack Obama are making one last pitch to voters. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg White House reporter Justin Sink on the differences between each president's stump speeches and the history of dueling presidents on the campaign trail. 
FOLLOW UP
 Bloomberg's latest midterm election report: The Latest on Trump’s Last Day of Midterm Election Campaigning
You can follow Justin at: @justinsink 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Justin Sink (Bloomberg News)
